bibl.title: Homer on a Puzzling Ostrakon. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The ostrakon, written in different styles by an apprentice scribe, contains a paraphrase of Iliad III, 6, and a formulaic expression that occurs in Iliad III, 171 and 228. Deir el Bahari, VIth century AD.
bibl.seg: CRIBIORE Raffaella, Homer on a Puzzling Ostrakon. Avec résumé en anglais.

The ostrakon, written in different styles by an apprentice scribe, contains a paraphrase of Iliad III, 6, and a formulaic expression that occurs in Iliad III, 171 and 228. Deir el Bahari, VIth century AD.
